hachyderm.io.description:
Here we are trying to build a curated network of respectful professionals in the tech industry around the globe. Welcome anyone who follows the rules and needs a safe home or fresh start.

We are hackers, professionals, enthusiasts, and are passionate about life, respect, and digital freedom. We believe in peace and balance.

Safe space. Tech Industry. Economics. OSINT. News. Rust. Linux. Aurae. Kubernetes. Go. C. Infrastructure. Security. LGTBQIA+. Pets. Hobbies.

fosstodon.org.description: Fosstodon is an English speaking Mastodon instance that is open to anyone who is interested in technology; particularly free & open source software.

techhub.social.description: A hub primarily for passionate technologists, but everyone is welcome

mastodon.lol.description: A Mastodon server friendly towards anti-fascists, members of the LGBTQ+ community, hackers, and the like. Please read Mastodon.lol/about before joining.

registration.message: Please choose a different server. Thank you.

o3o.ca.description:
欢迎来到o3o(嘟站)！这是一个泛话题社区，无论你的兴趣是什么，你都可以自由地通过发布“嘟嘟”来吐槽一切、摸鱼扯皮。
本社区由位于加拿大的 O3O.Foundation 项目运营。我们相信由社会组织运营基本通讯软件和设施是必要的，它们不应被控制在大型企业和政府手中。

mastodon.nu.description: Det här är en öppen och vänlig server i första hand till för svenskar och de nordiska länderna. Den drivs ideellt men på ett professionellt sätt och med 100% förnybar energi.

meow.social.description: This instance run by Tiwy57, Nomaxice, Deki, Blur and Roy is focused around the furry fandom and is open to all fluffies and scalies!

registration.message:
As a result of recent mass registrations, due to a mass migration from twitter users, we are beginning to reach the performance limits of the server. We need to proceed to a planned upgrade to be able to handle the added load.



Registrations are temporarily closed, with estimation of reopening after january once we have upgraded our server infrastructure. Until then you can try to join one of the many other instances across the fediverse, there are plenty of other furry servers still able to take in new users.


You can choose another furry instance by visiting FurryFediverse to find some recommendations.


Thank you for your understanding, see you around on fedi!

sigmoid.social.description: A social space for people researching, working with, or just interested in AI!

registration.message:
Les inscriptions sur ce serveur sont fermées. Nous souhaitons ainsi favoriser la diversité des acteurs et la décentralisation du fédiverse.
Nous recommandons de vous inscrire sur piaille.fr
Vous pouvez trouver un serveur pour le rejoindre sur joinmastodon.org ou joinfediverse.org.

eldritch.cafe.description: Une instance se voulant accueillante pour les personnes queers, féministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant·e·s. Nous sommes principalement francophone.

registration.message:
[fr] Les inscriptions sont fermées pour une durée indéterminée pour permettre à l'équipe d'administration de gérer Eldritch Café dans de bonnes conditions. En attendant, si quelqu'un de l'instance vous l'a recommandé vous pouvez lui demander une créer une invitation pour nous rejoindre sur https://eldritch.cafe/invites

[en] Registrations are closed for an indefinite period to allow the administration team to manage Eldritch Café in good conditions. In the meantime, if someone from the instance has recommended it to you, you can ask them to create an invitation to join us at https://eldritch.cafe/invites

glasgow.social.description: A place for communities in and around Glasgow, Scotland.

registration.message: Les inscriptions sur Framapiaf ne sont pas possibles, mais vous pouvez trouver d'autres plateformes compatibles sur lesquelles vous inscrire sur joinmastodon.org.

registration.message:
This server is temporarily closed for registrations.
Please sign up at climatejustice.rocks instead.

artsio.com.description: Artsio is a creativity and art focused community on the fediverse.

wandering.shop.description: The Wandering Shop is an instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community, but open to anyone. Our local timeline should have the feel of a coffee shop at a good convention.

registration.message:
Joining Wandering.Shop

We are presently allowing Wandering Shop members to invite friends/contacts to join the server with a limited invite code each week. Please contact a current member to get the latest code if one remains open. We will issue new invites approximately weekly until we have a bit of stability achived after the current exodus from other social spaces.

litmind.club.description: For people passionate about photography, filmmaking, modeling and image artists in general. Run by Litmind.com with love and care.

theblower.au.description:

You don't have to be Australian to post here, but it helps.

Vous pouvez aussi vous inscrire sur mon instance Peertube ou une autre :)

registration.message: Pour une meilleure répartition des personnes sur Mastodon et le fédiverse, et pour maintenir un service convenable et de qualité sur cette instance, les inscriptions sur pouet.chapril.org sont temporairement fermées pour une durée indéterminée. Pour rejoindre Mastodon, un annuaire d'instances est disponible à l'adresse suivante : https://joinmastodon.org/fr/servers

registration.message:
Registrations are temporarily disabled while we look for solutions to prevent spam accounts. If you know someone on this instance, they can invite you anyway, or, you can find another instance on joinmastodon.org.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

journa.host.description: Journa.host is a reliable home for journalists on Mastodon.

registration.message:
Journa.host is a Mastodon server for journalists. Membership is limited to working journalists, retired journalists, academics, and others who are clearly journalism-related.

If that doesn’t describe you, there are lots of other sites to choose from at https://joinmastodon.org/servers

If you're a journalist interested in joining the journa.host Mastodon, please review our community guidelines and submit your application for review by our team of moderators.
